A Psalm of praise. Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all ye lands.<RF>praise: or, thanksgiving<Rf><RF>all…: Heb. all the earth<Rf>
Serve the LORD with gladness: come before his presence with singing.
Know ye that the LORD he <FI>is<Fi> God: <FI>it is<Fi> he <FI>that<Fi> hath made us, and not we ourselves; <FI>we are<Fi> his people, and the sheep of his pasture.<RF>and not…: or, and his we are<Rf>
Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, <FI>and<Fi> into his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, <FI>and<Fi> bless his name.
For the LORD <FI>is<Fi> good; his mercy <FI>is<Fi> everlasting; and his truth <FI>endureth<Fi> to all generations.<RF>to all…: Heb. to generation and generation<Rf><CM>
